name: cannlytics
description: Cannlytics is a suite of tools that you can use to wrangle, standardize, and analyze cannabis data.

scripts.app:web: cd app & flutter run -d chrome & cd ../
scripts.app:publish: cd app & flutter clean & flutter pub get & flutter build web --web-renderer html --dart-define=PRODUCTION=true & firebase deploy --project cannlytics --only hosting:app & cd ../
scripts.metrc:lint: cd metrc & flutter pub run import_sorter:main & cd ../
scripts.metrc:web: cd metrc & flutter run -d chrome & cd ../
scripts.metrc:watch: cd metrc & flutter pub run build_runner watch & cd ../
scripts.metrc:windows: cd metrc & flutter run -d windows --no-sound-null-safety & cd ../
scripts.metrc:build: cd metrc & flutter build web --no-sound-null-safety --dart-define=PRODUCTION=true & cd ../
scripts.ai:deploy-cannabis-data-daily: cd ./tools/data/state_data/get_cannabis_data_daily & gcloud functions deploy get_cannabis_data_daily --entry-point get_cannabis_data_daily --runtime python39 --trigger-topic get_cannabis_data_daily --memory 1024MB --timeout 300 --env-vars-file env.yaml & cd ../../../../
scripts.console:serve: cd console & webpack serve --env development & cd ../
scripts.console:collectstatic: set PROJECT=console & echo yes|python manage.py collectstatic
scripts.console:container: npm run console:collectstatic & gcloud builds submit . --tag gcr.io/cannlytics/cannlytics-console ./Dockerfile
scripts.console:publish: npm run console:build & npm run console:docker & npm run console:run & npm run console:deploy
scripts.docs:install: docker pull squidfunk/mkdocs-material & docker build -t squidfunk/mkdocs-material docs
scripts.website:start: conda activate cds & npm-run-all --parallel website:serve website:livereload website:dev
scripts.website:serve: cd website & webpack serve --env development & cd ../
scripts.website:collectstatic: set PROJECT=website & echo yes|python manage.py collectstatic
scripts.website:container: npm run website:collectstatic --noinput & gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/cannlytics/cannlytics-website
scripts.website:publish: conda activate cds & npm run website:build & npm run website:collectstatic & npm run website:docker & npm run website:run & npm run website:deploy
